Text.content:
If formatting is important in a targeting mobile application, a proven OpenCms concept can be used: pages with element settings. Pages with element settings in OpenCms control the overall layout of a web page, the arrangement of content on a page up to the fine granular formatting of individual content parts.

This mechanism, in the same way, is available via the JSON API's page handler. Editors in this way can change the order of contents in a mobile application or their individual style.

The presentation and formatting requirements of a targeting mobile application may be different from a web page. It is possible to create individual settings configurations for the JSON API and for individual target applications.
